From: KSLawdogg@...


    Less than 2000 feet away from the Alliance Island a black pod surfaced to 
the top of the see, its scanning equipment coming out of the shell and 
initiating the DNA scan.  This pod was one of the originals from the Axalon, 
breaking orbit after the Planetbuster struck, and the pod crashed into the 
sea, and seismic activity only now released it.
